thread.title: Watch the Lively New Trailer for 'The Get Down' Part II
thread.title_full: Watch the Lively New Trailer for 'The Get Down' Part II

title: Watch the Lively New Trailer for 'The Get Down' Part II
text:
Watch the Lively New Trailer for 'The Get Down' Part II Netflix announces series return date Netflix has announced the return date for 'The Get Down' Part II via a new trailer for the hip-hop drama. 
Netflix has unveiled the release date for The Get Down 's next set of episodes. The show's "Part II" will premiere this spring. The network announced the return of Baz Luhrmann and Stephen Adly Guirgis' hip-hop drama via a short trailer. Related Inside 'The Get Down': How Baz Luhrmann Recreated the Birth of Hip-Hop Australian filmmaker and producer Nelson George on going back to the old-school sources for a brand new way of retelling hip-hop's origin story 
In the brief 15-second clip, lively performance scenes are interwoven with audience clips, a motorcycle ride and DJ shots. "We're going to take our music from minor to major league," a voiceover says. 
Set in the late 1970s in the South Bronx, the show recreates the fictionalized moments leading to the birth of hip-hop. The cast includes Jaden Smith, Shameik Moore, Giancarlo Esposito and Jimmy Smits. Nas, who also writes raps for the show , is an executive producer and Grandmaster Flash serves as an associate producer. 
As Deadline notes, Part II takes place in 1978, one year after the first six episodes, which premiered last August, took place. 
The Get Down will return to Netflix on April 7th. More News
